S:log-item.D:comment: MAHOUT-401: Use NamedVector in seq2sparse Adds the -nv option to SparseVectorFromSequenceFiles to create NamedVectors instead of Random or SequentialAccess vectors Enhances DictionaryVictorizerTest to assert that the proper vector types are generated Adds SparseVectorFromSequenceFilesTest to validate the proper command-line option behavior and vector types. Extracts random document generation code to RandomDocumentGenerator utility clas
